sentences.english: They are the five problems listed above.
sentences.chinese: 就是整上面讲的那五个字。

sentences.english: On the uniqueness of entire functions;
sentences.chinese: 研究了一类整函数的拟素性。

sentences.english: Prices for synthetic bristles haven't changed much all these years.
sentences.chinese: 价格为综合性的刚毛没有整这些数年多改变。

sentences.chinese: 整一套静止只有锲而不舍，两个月就可初见功效。

We explore the solution of non-linear mixed integer programming problem(NMIP).

sentences.english: Surveillance and preventive measures have been stepped up to the serious response level in public hospitals.
sentences.chinese: 公共医院整在加强针对此次事件的监控和防护措施。

sentences.english: The figures in the table are rounded to the nearest ton.
sentences.chinese: 表中的数字四舍五入到最接近的整吨数。

sentences.english: He worked himself to death, finally and precisely, at 3:00 A.M. Sunday morning.
sentences.chinese: 终于，他工作致死于星期天凌晨三点整。

sentences.english: This article may be re-printed in its entirety, with no changes and this resource box included.
sentences.chinese: 这篇文章可能重新印刷整，没有变化，这包括资源箱。

sentences.english: Watches made from top quality leather will look sharp in any occasion.
sentences.chinese: 手表制成优质皮革看起来整在任何场合。

sentences.english: Let's see here. Your total would be 5929 dollars.
sentences.chinese: 让我看一下，你的总数是五千九百二十九美元整。

sentences.chinese: 质地轻巧不清淡，汲取急速，皮肤整润泽。

sentences.english: I get the house all shipshape while he is away.
sentences.chinese: 他不在的时候，我把房子打扫得干干净净，整整洁齐。

sentences.english: Yhe conference will have lasted a full week by the time it ends.
sentences.chinese: 到结束时，会议持续了整一周的时间。
